name: Operation Stardust
description:
Overview

Inspired by the game Legend of Legaia, Operation Stardust is an Turn Based RPG with Input-Based Combat. The difference from typical turn based games is that instead of simply selecting an 'Attack' command in order to initiate a attack, the player specifies the location of each attack. 'Right' and 'Left' will strike with the right and left arms, respectively, and 'High' and 'Low' strike at their respective heights. Each direction has its own pros and cons, depending upon the opponent, weapons equipped. 

Gameplay

Use combat commands to create attack combos. Certain strings of attacks initiates a "Charged Attack" which are special combo attacks that deal significantly more damage. It is up to the player to uncover each character's special combo by experimenting with command strings. Once the player has determined the correct string, it is saved in a list which can be viewed during the player's turn.  For example, to initiate Flaming Fist, enter the command: Right-Left-Right. 

Charge Attacks expend AP. Combine Charged Arts with Normal Attacks to maintain your AP.
